answers.answer: I had it with both my girls but not my boy. I didn't have any symptkms but hbp through out pregnancy but right at the end of both I had to be induced due to pressure being so high I was at risk of seizures.

I had swelling in my feet, and my liver was hurting. It's the right side, top of your stomach where your ribs are. I always thought it was the baby in my ribs. Never knew I had it until my water broke at 36 weeks.

high blood pressure, blurred vision, head ache, swelling in ankles, hands, face, overly tired, a sense of "something being wrong" floaters in the vision. I had eclampsia with my first then preeclampsia with my second... my advice is to stay on your left side in a calm environment, don't eat sodium, and try to relax until your test results are in. If you get pain in the upper abdomen, or your symptoms worsen, go to the hospital.

I feel like something is wrong.. I don't know if it's just me worrying or what. I have been feeling really tired lately even though I sleep fine at night but it seems like I can't get enough sleep and because I have to work during the day it's stressful because im tired. My left hand keeps going limp like I have to force it to move could that be a symptom?

Your hand going limp sounds more like carpal tunnel, which we can develop while pregnant.Try not to worry. Just relax and wait for the results. There are different degrees of preeclampsia and sometimes it can be slowed with rest and other things.
Thank u :-) I really appreciate it

I started with preeclampsia, that eventually developed into Hellp syndrome .. I was very I'll .. Swollen face, hands, feet. I had these spots in my vision, double kidney infection, liver was affected, worst back pain of my life! Emergency C-Section at 34 weeks to a 3lb baby. They had to leave the epidural on my back for 3 days after delivery due to risk of internal bleeding from how low my blood enzymes were. It was so rough. I hope this pregnancy turns out much better. I hope yours doesn't get severe

question: I'm doing a 24hour urine test right now. I just want to know what r some of the sign to look out for? And advice from mommies who had preeclampsia or have it
title: Preeclampsia
